Value: AL1. Developed a serverless training pipeline for fine-tuning LLMs
- Need for a Training Pipeline: A training pipeline was required for fine-tuning LLMs efficiently

- Developed a Training Pipeline:
  - Download from S3 for efficient data retrieval
  - Push to Hugging Face for model storage and sharing
  - Parameter tracking with WandB
Cost Management: Managing the costs associated with fine-tuning LLMs was a key challenge
Serverless Optimization: Utilized a serverless architecture to reduce costs
- Enabled fine-tuning of LLMs efficiently, optimizing compute resource utilization
